tasks.task: [STRETCH GOAL] Add 'archive completed tasks' button EDIT
Must be in edit mode to edit table
editable fields should be visually distinguished
When scrolled to bottom, there should be space between last table row and new task form
tasks.notes: No content is actually cut off, but it looks dangerously close!
Should give instructions for editing table

tasks.task: Add hover background color to 'Done' checkbox and edit icon
tasks.notes: We haven't figured out how to do this without messing up other conditional styling in JS file -- possibly ALL styling should be done via the CSS sheet?

tasks.task: Add min widths to table columns
Edit form should be exactly the size of the TD
Rewrite JS file to use classes TaskObjArr and TaskObj
tasks.notes: We have a lot of functions that take one or the other of these as arguments and would probably be better as methods of a class

tasks.task: Filter by priority, complete status, due date
Make edit form submit buttons pretty

tasks.notes: I tried downloading js-confetti, but it requires 'modules', which caused problems with 'cross-origin requests'. So confetti seems maybe above my pay grade for now.
Sorting by A, then B should result in a list sorted by both

tasks.task: Edit icon should hover in top right corner
tasks.notes: Otherwise we need to scroll to the top of list to go into edit mode

tasks.task: Submit multi-line forms with cmd+enter or ctrl+enter
